short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 and SHA-512 hashes!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Simple to use Chrome extension to immediately generate your own hashes with a single click. The current version supports MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 and SHA-512.
